name: Rouge Haddock
description:
--Work In Progress-- Overview

Roguelike where you are a fish sent in to collect shiny snail shells in hazardous rock pools.

Your haddock will in search of shells. Each "Run" you must collect the shells, avoiding the enemies, and wait for the vortex to spawn to carry you to the next pool.

You can end the run by summoning the Rescue Hook (R) and grabbing it to safety and leave with all your shells. If you die, all your shells will be lost!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Hold shift + Move to just turn

Q - Fire projectile

R - Spawn rescue hook

Space - Wait

Roadmap
  • More enemies!
  • More dynamic store update
  • Proper UI, including more info in a level

Written in Rust with Bevy
